Containers.Name: RDP-Calibre
Containers.Description: RDP-Calibre is a combo docker for calibre web server and gui (through webRDP) [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where the rdp configuration and library files will reside[br] [span style='color: #E80000;']8080[/span] is the port for the calibre desktop GUI (through webRDP) [br] [span style='color: #E80000;']8081[/span] is the port the calibre server[br][br] Don't forget to enter in the host ports and app folder. [br][br] To access the calibre desktop GUI, open the WebUI in unRaid. Both the server and the GUI use the same database in the /config folder.[br] Default resolution for the Calibre GUI window is 1280x720. You can change that to any resolution by opening the Advanced View and modifying the HEIGHT and WIDTH variables.[br] This docker will install version 2.28. [span style='color: #E80000;']To get the latest updates, set the EDGE variable to 1[/span] under Advanced View.
Containers.Overview: Calibre is an e-book management software. RDP-Calibre is a combo docker for calibre web server and gui (through webRDP). With this docker, you get the best of both worlds, and they both use the same database.
